trans-unit.source: Gets the state of a <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Får statusen for en <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The DataRowState enumeration is returned by the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> class.
trans-unit.target: DataRowState-opplisting som er returnert av <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Data.DataRow>klassen.</xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The row has been added to a <xref href="System.Data.DataRowCollection"></xref>, and <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges*> has not been called.
trans-unit.target: Raden har blitt lagt til en <xref href="System.Data.DataRowCollection"> </xref>, og <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges*>har ikke blitt kalt.</xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges*>

trans-unit.source: The row was deleted using the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.Delete*> method of the <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Raden ble slettet ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Data.DataRow.Delete*>metoden for den <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.DataRow.Delete*>

trans-unit.source: The row has been created but is not part of any <xref href="System.Data.DataRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Raden er opprettet, men er ikke en del av en <xref href="System.Data.DataRowCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> is in this state immediately after it has been created and before it is added to a collection, or if it has been removed from a collection.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> er i denne tilstanden umiddelbart etter at den er opprettet og før det legges til i en samling, eller hvis den har blitt fjernet fra en samling.

trans-unit.source: The row has been modified and <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges*> has not been called.
trans-unit.target: Raden har blitt endret og <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges*>har ikke blitt kalt.</xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges*>

trans-unit.source: The row has not changed since <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges*> was last called.
trans-unit.target: Raden ble ikke endret siden <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges*>sist ble kalt.</xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges*>
